backend/main.mo: Backend canister defining user profiles, vehicles, notifications, activation tokens, and access-control helpers with mixed authorization and storage modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a specific activation-status fix to affected frontend files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including hooks, pages, components, and configuration assets.
frontend/.eslintrc.cjs: ESLint configuration enabling TypeScript, React, and hook rules with custom warnings and ignored patterns.
frontend/.prettierrc.json: Prettier formatting rules specifying semicolons, print width, tab size, and trailing commas.
frontend/CHANGE_CONTROL_POLICY.md: Defines protected interfaces and mandatory review rules for route structure, authentication flow, and backend API stability.
frontend/CHANGELOG.md: Project changelog documenting major additions, changes, and protected interfaces for versions 1.0.0 and 0.1.0.
frontend/ci-run-gates.sh: Shell script running all frontend quality gates in CI.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color tokens and themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up meta tags, PWA manifest, icons, and loading the React app.
frontend/PR_CHECKLIST.md: Pull-request checklist enforcing change-control verification, quality gates, testing, and documentation updates.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest describing app metadata, icons, categories, and launch configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling install, fetch caching strategies, and activation with network-first for HTML and cache-first for static assets.
frontend/QUALITY_GATES.md: Documentation describing the automated quality gates and how to run them.
frontend/README_CHANGE_CONTROL.md: Overview guide explaining how developers should follow the change-control system during feature work.
frontend/README_VERSIONING.md: Documentation describing the project's semantic versioning approach and release discipline.
frontend/src/__tests__/router-smoke.test: Empty test file placeholder for router smoke tests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React app routing and query client, defining all app routes and providers.
frontend/src/components/activation/Vehic: UI card for displaying activation status and redeeming a vehicle registration activation token.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Access denial screen with messaging and navigation back to dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Displays detailed profile bootstrap errors with backend health checks and copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Sign‑in screen using Internet Identity with branding and feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/auth/StartupBoot: Startup bootstrap error UI with classification, health checks, and optional auto‑retry display.
frontend/src/components/brand/AppLogo.ts: Logo component rendering the project logo at selectable sizes.
frontend/src/components/i18n/LanguageSwi: Empty file reserved for language switching component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper that shows a header and footer when authenticated and renders children within the main content area.
frontend/src/components/lost/MarkLostDia: Dialog for reporting a vehicle as lost, stolen, or pawned with category selection and a required note.
frontend/src/components/lost/ReportFound: Dialog allowing users to submit a finder report when a previously lost vehicle is found.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppHeader.ts: Top navigation bar with links, user menu, and optional admin entry, supporting mobile and desktop layouts.
frontend/src/components/system/TopLevelE: Error boundary that catches top-level render errors and displays a fallback UI.
Fallback UI displaying an error message with steps to resolve and a reload button.
frontend/src/components/transfer/Initiat: Panel to start a vehicle ownership transfer, prompting for a PIN and generating a sharable transfer code.
frontend/src/components/transfer/PinProm: Dialog prompting users to enter and validate a PIN before completing sensitive actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorBootstrapStat: Tracks actor bootstrap errors and implements bounded and continuous auto‑retry with timers and manual retry support.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Provides admin-related queries and mutations including admin checks, invite code handling, activation tokens, and system stats.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendHealth.ts: Checks backend reachability using an anonymous actor and periodically fetches basic diagnostics.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, logout, and exposes identity status via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useLostVehicles.ts: Fetches lost vehicles and provides mutations to mark vehicles lost/stolen/pawned or report them found with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Fetches the caller's notifications with polling and allows marking notifications as read.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Runs the onboarding mutation with detailed logging, error normalization, and triggers profile/admin state updates.
frontend/src/hooks/usePin.ts: Handles PIN existence checks and provides mutations to set up or update the user's PIN.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Loads and saves the caller’s user profile with identity-aware caching and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: Supports initiating and accepting vehicle transfers and refreshes relevant vehicle and user data.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleCheck.ts: Runs a vehicle status check against the backend using an engine number.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicleRegistratio: Provides react-query hooks to check user activation for vehicle registration and redeem activation tokens with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts: Defines hooks for fetching user vehicles, a single vehicle, and registering new vehicles via actor calls with react-query caching.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Empty placeholder file for an i18n provider component.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/ar.ts: Empty placeholder for Arabic language definitions.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/en.ts: Empty placeholder for English language definitions.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/id.ts: Empty placeholder for Indonesian language definitions.
frontend/src/i18n/languages/zh-Hans.ts: Empty placeholder for Simplified Chinese language definitions.
frontend/src/i18n/storage.ts: Empty placeholder for i18n storage utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, dark mode overrides, and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/__tests__/VehiclesPag: Empty test file placeholder for VehiclesPage fetch flow.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an about page with app description, features, and admin contact info.
frontend/src/pages/AcceptTransferPage.ts: A form page for accepting vehicle ownership transfers using a transfer code with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing system stats, access checks, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteToke: Admin interface to generate activation tokens and copy related instructions for users.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user dashboard with vehicle counts, notifications, reported vehicles, and quick navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/LostVehiclesPage.tsx: Shows a searchable list of vehicles reported lost, stolen, or pawned with status badges and details.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays user notifications, supports marking them as read, and shows loading or empty states.
Empty page file with no implementation provided.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Renders onboarding form for new users or first admin claim and submits profile details to complete onboarding.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows and edits user profile data, logout handling, and PIN creation/update with related activation checks.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterVehiclePage.t: Provides form to register a vehicle, including photo upload with progress and activation checks before submission.
Manages PIN setup and update for security settings with simple validation and feedback.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleCheckPage.tsx: Checks vehicle status by engine number and displays vehicle details, status badges, and error or loading states.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed vehicle info, status badges, and owner actions like transfers or lost reports.
frontend/src/pages/VehiclesPage.tsx: Shows the user's vehicles with status indicators and options to register or activate registration.
frontend/src/routes/__tests__/RootRouteG: Empty test file placeholder for RootRouteGate.
frontend/src/routes/RootRouteGate.tsx: Controls authentication, profile loading, actor bootstrap status, and routing to onboarding or sign‑in.
frontend/src/utils/__tests__/bootstrapEr: Empty test file placeholder for bootstrap error utilities.
frontend/src/utils/actorProxy.ts: Creates a safe proxy around the backend actor to gracefully handle admin token initialization failures.
frontend/src/utils/actorQueryKey.ts: Generates consistent React Query keys for actor-related queries.
frontend/src/utils/adminAllowlist.ts: Provides a client-side allowlist for admin principals and utilities to check or retrieve them.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapError.ts: Provides utilities to detect canister-stopped conditions, extract technical error details, and classify bootstrap errors with user guidance.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeActorError.t: Normalizes actor call errors into user-safe messages with categorized error types and contextual handling.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingTroubleshoo: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/version.ts: Defines the app's version and build date constants.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with typography, container queries, animations, theming extensions, and custom colors.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, issues, and feature requests related to fixing incorrect admin activation status behavior.
